title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Competencies: Ethical Responsibility in Instructional Design and Technology—Critical Thinking and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational design and technology utilization experience, general understanding of socio-ethical issues
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Identify three or more ethical issues that may arise in educational technology design and propose potential solutions for each.
By analyzing real-world cases, apply a framework to evaluate the ethical impacts of instructional design on learners and society.
Develop instructional design prototypes incorporating ethical considerations using Critical Design methodology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
